item.title: Eco-homes- Living the good life
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U3FAlByYnoE The Guardian Published on Apr 7, 2011 Eco-homes: Living the good life Subscribe to the Guardian HERE: http://bitly.com/UvkFpD Following his trip to the self-sustainable Lammas in Wales, Heydon Prowse visits Pembrokeshire national park to meet two families living in low-cost, environmentally sustainable dwellings
